testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Instructor" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I click the 'New Class' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on a New Class page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I create new class with random name
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I click the 'Class Homepage' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Content Repository" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Default Unit" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Assignment 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I create question "Regrading" with label "Regrading"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I start the "Assignment 1" assignment in "Default Unit" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I see the submission report with warning text "Warning: There appears to be errors in one or more of your answers."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment again
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then my score 0 out of 1 (0 %) is shown in a grade report
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Content Repository" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "Current Class" column open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I click "All Lessons & Assignments" in the "Lessons & Assignments" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I click "Assignment 1" in the "All" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I edit the "Assignment 1" assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I edit the question to have name "Regrading 2" with label "Regrading 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I save & close the edited question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I select "Assignment 1 - Homework/Quiz" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I select "Other users with grades" in "List" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I select "Most Recent" in "Results" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I click the grade for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I see the test record details of "Assignment 1" for the current user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I click the Regrade Question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I am on the Regrading page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I see that the checkbox for revision number 1 is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I see that the checkbox for revision number 2 is enabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: When I check the Select All checkbox
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: Then I see that the checkbox for revision number 1 is not checked
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.name: And I see that the checkbox for revision number 2 is checked
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts

testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that the current revision checkbox is disabled if at has no attempts
